snippet:
Case: 4:14-cv-00069-ERW Doc. #: 438 Filed: 08/16/17 Page: 1 of 13 PageID #: 12291



                                     INSTRUCTION NO.         I
        Members of the jury, the instructions I gave at the beginning of the trial and during the

trial are still in effect. Now I am going to give you some additional instructions.
